code: import React from"react";import{PencilAltIcon,XCircleIcon}from"@heroicons/react/solid";import SessionService from"../../services/SessionService";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SessionsRow(_ref){let{session,hallsMap,moviesMap}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const handleDelete=()=>{SessionService.delete(session.id);};const formattedTime=session.startTime?new Date(session.startTime).toLocaleString():"—";const hallName=hallsMap[session.hall]||"—";const movieName=moviesMap[session.movie]||"—";const handleUpdate=()=>{navigate("/admin/sessions/update/".concat(session.id),{state:{session}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"border-b text-sm text-gray-800",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 text-center",children:session.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 text-center",children:formattedTime}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 text-center",children:movieName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 text-center",children:hallName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 text-center",children:session.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUpdate,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PencilAltIcon,{className:"w-5 h-5"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDelete,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XCircleIcon,{className:"mr-5 w-5 h-5"})})]})]});}
